De curacio de dislocacio dels ditz dels pes.	Care for the treatment of this hip displacement?
Cove que aquel qu’es dislocat sia engualhat am pauca extencio ses trebal; e aquo que no es dificil, abantz es leugier.	First and foremenerly make the one who is dislocated comfortable by encouraging them to relax their hip joint as much as possible without causing pain or further injury; afterward carefully reposition (reduce) the dislocated bone back into its socket, which can be a delicate process best done under medical supervision. It's essential not to cause harm during this procedure and ensure adequate immobilization once realigned is achieved
Mays si la dislocacio es en alcus nozes del dos del pe, lahoras cove que fassas cezer le malaute le sieu pe sobre loc engual de la terra o sobre taula, e sia estant ayssi cum si anava.	If the dislocation is in either of your lower back or neck (the sacroiliac joint and cervical spine), one should first make sure that if there's a herniated disc present which might be pressing on nerves, it doesn't compress the pelvis or cause instability. Afterward, gently lift this protrusion using massage therapy to realign any misalignments in your sacroiliac joint and cervical spine while ensuring that you maintain an upright posture over a stable surface like the floor or bed as if standing; it'
E aprop tu sta de pes, e pausa le tieu pe sobre aquo que imineys de las juncturas, e aprop calca aquel am le tieu pe am vertut entro que retorne, e que vejas aquel ja engualhat e no aparesca en le loc eminencia.	Stand with your weight evenly distributed on both feet and pause to place pressure over the joints in question as you imagine them realigning; after applying this self-adjustment, calibrate how much force is required for a gradual return of motion without any pain or reappearance once it's achieved. This careful approach helps prevent aggravation and supports healing processes.
E aprop pausa dejos le ventre del pe de lu una taula que prengua tot le pe, a la qual sian dos caps, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent e ferma per tres dias; e aprop deslia aquel e fay aquel repausar de ambulacio per motz dias, entro que sia estrenhut e de reddicio sia assegurat.	Stop and take rest with your back on the floor in front of a standing frame that supports the entire body; ensure it has two sloping caps for comfort and to maintain an erect posture firmly, doing this regularly each day over three days without lifting heavy objects or bending. This is essential during recovery from low-back surgery before starting movement therapy as soon as feasible while being assured of safety in all activities undertaken outside the clinic setting.

De las specias de dislocacio que sian faytas am plagua o am fractura o am quascuna ensemps.	Of the types of displacement that can occur in fish or bone or any combination,
Quan accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, e tu te perforssas en la curacio de aquela e en la restauracio de lu, motas veguadas succezeys la mort.	When you suffer from the disease' endlessly succeeds in its deathly ways to us all.
E per aquo no cove que sobre la curacio de lu presuma, sino aquel que es savi en l’art, de lonc uzatge, misericordios e pietados, tardiu, no-ardit ni presomptuos; e que use en le comensament de medicinas que cedan apostemas cautz tant solament, e leyssa le malaute al divinal jutgament, sino ad aquel al qual speras salut de perdicio, am de la malautia alleviacio, e en la qual appareys alcuna speransa.	E for any reason that overlooks the cure of his illness but rather assumes he is wise in art long enough to have knowledge and mercy endured patiently without haste or presumption; who uses medicines that only cause caustic application, not opening wounds further while also relieving divinely ordained pain as well. In this cure, some hope appears.
E adonc esforsa te tantost far de lu la reduccio en le comensament de la causa, denant que endevengua apostema caut.	Once you have done so much for it in terms of reduction into the common cause' end thereafter that austerity comes forth as well..
E adonc si le membre retorna segon que volem, lahoras aministra regiment le qual ceda apostema caut e cura la plagua am aquo que conveneys a lu dels enguentz desiccatius.	When the limb returns as you wish, then administer to it such regimen that induces apoplectic caust and heals with water appropriate for his bathing needs after being scoured dry by physicians' ointments. ✅🔬✨
E si dislocacio es am fractura e accideys en le os satagias separadas, lahoras tu perforsa le stement de lor, e fay en aquo so que havem dit en las malautias simplas de aquo que es precedit en les locz de aquels.	If dislocation is caused by a break and acidosis in the separated bones, then you should restore their position, using water to alleviate simple diseases of water that precede them at those places where such waters are found.✅🔬✨
E guarda e esquiva segon la tua vertut aquel del intrament en las vias de temor segon que a tu es precedida la mia predicacio; quar aquo es milhor a tu deves le tieu Creator, e mays permanent a la tua gloria, e mays saludos al tieu cos verays aquels en le tieu temps.	Guard and avoid according to your conscience the way of fear through the channels as I preceded it; water is better for you by God's will, perhaps even everlasting in your glory, and healthy well-be enduring times with those true ways that are yours.✅🔬✨
